TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Idriss_Déby, title = Idriss_Déby, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idriss_Déby} }

S.FORM: I 1952 a miheca saka 6 folad saka 18 a romi'ad masofoc ci Idriss Déby , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Chad anini i ci Idriss Déby, patirengan a romi'ad i 1990 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 2 a romi'ad.

I 1952 a miheca saka 6 folad saka 18 a romi'ad masofoc ci Idriss Déby , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Chad anini i ci Idriss Déby, patirengan a romi'ad i 1990 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 2 a romi'ad.
